quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There are two ways to slide easily through life: to believe everything or to doubt everything; both ways save us from thinking.
quotes.author: Alfred Korzybski

quotes.text: The least of things with a meaning is worth more in life than the greatest of things without it.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: If A is success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: The thoughts we choose to think are the tools we use to paint the canvas of our lives.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.text: By living deeply in the present moment we can understand the past better and we can prepare for a better future.
quotes.author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quotes.text: Most people are about as happy as they make up their minds to be
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: There is no duty we so underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: You have to do your own growing no matter how tall your grandfather was.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: As you think, so shall you become.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The best thing about the future is that it only comes one day at a time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Trust only movement. Life happens at the level of events, not of words. Trust movement.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.text: We need to find the courage to say NO to the things and people that are not serving us if we want to rediscover ourselves and live our lives with authenticity.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.text: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: All I can say about life is, Oh God, enjoy it!
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.text: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.text: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Respect should be earned by actions, and not acquired by years.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: No work or love will flourish out of guilt, fear, or hollowness of heart, just as no valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: Life is just a chance to grow a soul.
quotes.author: A. Powell Davies

quotes.text: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.text: Life is a succession of moments. To live each one is to succeed.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.text: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: Six essential qualities that are the key to success: Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
quotes.author: William C. Menninger

quotes.text: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
quotes.author: Margaret Cousins

quotes.text: Unless one is able to live fully in the present, the future is a hoax.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: Some do not understand that we must die, But those who do realize this settle their quarrels.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: For everything that lives is holy, life delights in life.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Life is about timing.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.text: Maxim for life: You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The person who lives life fully, glowing with life's energy, is the person who lives a successful life.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.text: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: I think that novels that leave out technology misrepresent life as badly as Victorians misrepresented life by leaving out sex.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: Life is a progress, and not a station.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: Life is divided into the horrible and the miserable.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Life is what happens while you are making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.text: To enjoy life, we must touch much of it lightly.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.text: To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Life is movement-we breathe, we eat, we walk, we move!
quotes.author: John Pierrakos

quotes.text: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: To change one's life, start immediately, do it flamboyantly, no exceptions.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The exercise of an extraordinary gift is the supremist pleasure in life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.text: The universe is transformation; our life is what our thoughts make it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Nothing in life is so exhilarating as to be shot at without result.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: Love and compassion open our own inner life, reducing stress, distrust and loneliness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.text: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: I never did a day's work in my life.  It was all fun.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.text: One is not called noble who harms living beings. By not harming living beings one is called noble.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Imagination is the living power and prime agent of all human perception.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.text: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: I have done my best: that is about all the philosophy of living one needs.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.text: So long as a person is capable of self-renewal they are a living being.
quotes.author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quotes.text: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: A noble one produces an abundance of merit by having a compassionate mind towards all living beings.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.text: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: There is no retirement for an artist, it's your way of living so there is no end to it.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.text: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; there's only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: The person who makes a success of living is the one who see his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.text: Happiness cannot be travelled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Where is the Life we have lost in living? Where is the wisdom we have lost in knowledge? Where is the knowledge we have lost in information?
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: The man who makes everything that leads to happiness depends upon himself, and not upon other men, has adopted the very best plan for living happily. This is the man of moderation, the man of manly character and of wisdom.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life are based on the labors of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the same measure as I have received and am still receiving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: No matter what happens in life, never lose sight of who you are.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.text: Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: No one can compete with you on being you. Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.text: Be strong. Be confident. Be the star of your own life.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.text: We meet ourselves time and again in a thousand disguises on the path of life.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
quotes.author: Alan Watts
